channel.title: Help
channel.description: Well i need a little help on doing a couple things..... 1. Adding in a server box and making it connect to that world(I tryed paulT's tut but didnt work) 2. Prioritizing methods e.g. making random events a higher priority than script commands Thx... (I have Deob 364)

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @pplsuqbawlz pplsuqbawlz
item.description:
@pplsuqbawlz wrote:

This is a bad move all around. Server boxes will have you detected in a jiffy.

Per instance of a world, there should be ONE UNCHANGING INSTANCE of RS2. Switching worlds without reloading is absolutely the same as yelling “hey I’m a cheater, ban me.”. How do I know? I made a world-switching client over a year and a half ago and released it… and a few of my buds were banned. No more to that.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

No code for either thing on me, but I guess you already have the concepts?

  1. Don’t know, never bothered with it. I used to stick the address in the arguments, but now I just run it as an applet and change the parameters (like the RS site does).

  2. Event based. When it detects a random event, pause your script handler and bring out the anti-randoms.

Read full topic
